name: Killing Flourish

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Intimidating Prowess, Intimidate 4 ranks, slayer level 4th.

sections.text: When you reduce your target to fewer than 0 hit points with a melee attack, as a swift action you can attempt an Intimidate check to demoralize all foes within 30 feet who can see your attack.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You inspire dread in other foes when you slay an enemy.
